Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A2 on the CEFR:

'Some people are worried about sharing their whereabouts on the internet. They think that by saying where they are, they are also telling everyone else. This can be a problem because not everyone we meet online is a good person. The internet has many opportunities to share our lives with the world. But sometimes we forget that our online life is connected to our real life. We can say things online that we wouldn't say in person.

A long time ago, some people started sharing their lives online. They were the first bloggers. They shared their thoughts, photos, and stories with the world. They faced many problems, like losing friends and getting into trouble. But they learned from their experiences and warned others about the dangers of sharing too much online.

One of the first bloggers was a young man named Justin Hall. He started sharing his life online in 1994. He wrote about his thoughts, feelings, and experiences. He even shared photos and art. People liked reading about him and started visiting his website. But one day, his website disappeared and he was very sad. He had to take it down because people were saying mean things about him.

Another blogger was Heather Armstrong. She wrote about her job and her life. But one day, someone sent her blog to her boss and she lost her job. This is what can happen when we share too much online. It's important to remember that our online life is connected to our real life. We should think carefully before sharing things online.

Heather Armstrong learned from her experience and started sharing her life again. She wrote about her family and her new life. She became famous as a mommy blogger and now she writes about her family and life. She learned that we can say anything online, but we should think carefully before doing so.'

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of level A2 on the CEFR:

"Some scientists made a movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? It's a mix of documentary and drama. They wanted to show that there's a lot we don't know about the universe. Some scientists thought the movie was wrong and said it was bad. But the movie is interesting. It talks about new discoveries that show the universe is strange. For example, scientists found out that water can change shape because of our thoughts. This is a big claim, but it's not proven. The movie shows some pictures of ice crystals, but scientists need more proof.

Actually, scientists have made many discoveries that show the universe is really strange. They found out that the universe is made of something we don't know about, and it's moving because of a mysterious force. They also found out that our brains take a little time to understand what's happening. And they found out where humans came from and how they spread across the world.

Some scientists are still trying to understand the universe, but it's very hard. They can't know everything. They have to accept that some things will always be a mystery. This is why they're trying to make a special theory that explains everything. For many people, the universe is amazing and incredible."

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of level A2 on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR):

Writing novels is difficult, but writing short stories is easy. It's like planting a small garden compared to planting a big forest. Both are important to me. When I finish a novel, I want to write some short stories. When I finish a group of short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories while writing a novel, and never write a novel while writing short stories. This helps me to focus and switch between the two. I started writing short stories in 1984. It was a new experience for me, but I liked it. I felt happy to have more possibilities in my writing. Readers liked my short stories too. One of my early short stories was included in a book called 'Tales from Abroad'. I like writing short stories because they are quick to finish. It usually takes me a week to write a short story. I can finish it and move on. Writing a novel takes a long time, and it can be hard. Writing short stories is a change of pace for me. I can write about small things, like an idea or a word. It's like improvising music. If my idea doesn't work, I don't worry. I can try again. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver don't always write great short stories. I learn from my mistakes and use them to improve my next story. Short stories help me to become a better novelist. They are like small marks I leave behind, and I remember how I felt when I wrote them. Short stories are like a way to share my feelings with readers.

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for a learner of English at level A2:

'Science is a way to understand the world around us. It helps us to cure diseases, make our lives easier, and learn about the universe. But science can also be complicated and sometimes fails to answer our questions. It has been used by many people, including poets, politicians, and scientists. Scientists often disagree with each other, and their ideas are not always accepted immediately. Sometimes, old ideas are replaced by new ones, and this can cause controversy.

Science has changed a lot over time. In the past, scientists thought they had already discovered everything, but then new discoveries were made. This has happened many times. Today, scientists are still making new discoveries and trying to understand the universe.

Science is important because it helps us to control nature and make our lives better. But it can also have negative effects if we don't use it wisely. That's why it's important for everyone to understand science and its impact on our world. The decisions we make about science can affect our future and the future of our planet.'

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A2 on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR):

'For some time, people thought that ebooks would be very popular and that print books would disappear. But now, many publishers are saying that ebook sales have stopped growing or are even going down. Some people think that this means ebooks are not as good as they thought they would be. But others still think that ebooks and print books can coexist.

Why do people worry about the future of books? The idea of a new technology replacing an old one is not new. In the past, people thought that radio would replace books, and then television would replace radio. But radio and television are still here.

When a new technology comes out, people often feel excited and a little scared. We form strong connections with things like books, TVs, and computers. When something new comes along, we have to adjust to it and say goodbye to the old way. That's why we often miss the old things and want to go back to them.

The idea of a technology "killing" another one is a common story that we tell ourselves. It's a way to understand and make sense of change. It's like a storybook that we use to think about the future and our fears about losing things that are important to us.'

I looked at what they eat, when they sleep, and how they organize their days. I thought that by looking at these small things, I could learn more about their personalities and careers.

The book is not just about the work they do, but also about how they live their daily lives. It's about how they make time for their work and still have a life. I struggled with these same questions in my own life, so I wanted to find out how others deal with them.

I read about many famous people and found out what they do every day. I wanted to show how their daily routines help them be creative and productive. I also wanted to show how their routines can be different from one another, and how they can be good or bad.

I didn't pretend to have all the answers, but I wanted to share what I learned from the famous people I researched. I hope that readers can learn something from their experiences and find inspiration for their own daily routines.

Here is the simplified text, adapted for a learner of English at the A2 level:

Howard became interested in fossils when he was six years old. His family couldn't go on holiday to Spain because of high interest rates. Instead, they went to the beach in England, where Howard found an ammonite. He wanted to be a paleontologist and study ancient creatures. He chose to focus on the earliest fossils, not the big, famous ones like dinosaurs. He worked hard and got his PhD. After that, he was worried about finding a job. He applied for a job at Tavistock College in London, but he didn't think he would get it. The person who was supposed to interview him was late because he had a fight with his wife. Howard's interview went ahead without him, and a colleague who didn't like him got the job. But Howard got the job anyway. He was surprised, but happy to have a job doing what he loved.

Months later, Howard found out that the colleague who got the job didn't want him to get it. Howard was a bit upset, but he was relieved to have the job. He liked the order and routine of his work, but sometimes things didn't go as planned. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his notes for a lecture. He was angry and had to cancel the lecture. Later, he met a colleague who told him about a new collection of fossils at the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard was excited and decided to go to the museum to study the fossils. He cancelled his other plans and worked hard to find a way to visit the museum.<|eot_id|>

'Professor Charles Spence loves to eat different foods. He even eats foods that some people might not like. For example, he eats ice cream made from bee larvae. It tastes a bit sweet and floral.

Professor Spence is a scientist who studies how we experience food and drink. He wants to know how our senses, like taste, smell, and sight, work together to make food taste good or bad. He thinks that things like the color and shape of plates, the noise in the room, and who we eat with can affect how we taste food.

Professor Spence has written a book about his research. He found out some interesting things. For example, the person who orders first at a restaurant usually likes their food the most. And when we eat with other people, we usually eat more than when we eat alone.

Professor Spence's lab is not very high-tech. He uses simple things like paper and drawing pins to do his research. He works with cooks and food companies to help them make healthier food. He thinks it's important to make food that is good for us and tastes good too.

Professor Spence has worked with famous chefs and food companies to help them make changes to their recipes. He thinks that if we know what we're eating, we might not like it as much. So, some companies make changes to their food without telling us.

Professor Spence has also worked with a famous chef to create a special dish that uses sound to make the food taste better. He thinks that music and sound can affect how we taste food. He's even worked with an airline to match music with food they serve to their passengers.'

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A2:

Our brains are very busy. We get a lot of information, but not all of it is true. We have to sort through it all to find what we need. We're also doing more things on our own, like booking flights and buying things online. We're doing the work of many people, but we're still trying to take care of our lives, families, and jobs. Our smartphones help us do all this. But, we think we're good at doing many things at once, but we're not. Our brains are not good at multitasking. We're really just switching between tasks quickly. This can be stressful and make us less efficient. It's like trying to juggle many balls, but we're not good at it.

We think we're getting a lot done, but we're not. Multitasking makes us less efficient. It can also make us feel stressed and confused. Our brains like new things, so we get distracted easily. This is bad for our brains. It's hard to focus when we have many things to do. Even having the chance to multitask is bad for our brains.

Some scientists say that multitasking is like having too many emails. We feel like we have to answer them all, but it's hard to do anything else. We're not good at multitasking, and it's making our brains tired.

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for learners of English at level A2 (CEFR):

"Do animals have feelings and emotions like humans do? Some scientists used to think not, but now they are starting to study animal behavior and emotions more closely. For example, a chimpanzee in a Swedish zoo broke up concrete to throw at visitors. Was he being mean? In the US, female bats help other mothers with their babies. Are they being kind?

Fifty years ago, scientists only looked at animal behavior, not their feelings. But now, they are studying emotions in animals like bats, chimpanzees, rats, dolphins, and even chickens. This has started a big debate: can animals really think and feel like humans do?

One scientist, Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, thinks that if animals can solve problems and enjoy it, we should stop eating meat. Another scientist, Professor Aubrey Manning, says we should rethink how we think about animal intelligence. And a third scientist, Professor Euan MacPhail, thinks we should not attribute human thoughts to animals.

The debate is not just about science, but also about ethics and philosophy. Can we really know what it's like to be an animal, like a bat or a cow? Some scientists think we should treat animals with more respect and kindness, while others disagree.

In a recent study, starlings were put in different cages. Some had a lot of space and water, while others were cramped and miserable. The birds in the good cages were happier and healthier, and even seemed to get depressed when they were in the bad cages. This shows that animals can have feelings and emotions, just like humans do."

'Thinking deeply about what we read or hear is called critical thinking. Adrian West, a researcher, says that technology can help us learn, but it can also make it harder to think deeply. He thinks that we are exposed to a lot of bad ideas and opinions, and this can be confusing. We have a lot of information, but this doesn't always mean we know more or make better decisions.

Reading is important for critical thinking. However, people are reading less and less. This might be because they are spending more time watching TV and playing video games. Patricia Greenfield, a professor, says that reading helps us think deeply and imagine things. Video games and TV can also help us learn, but they don't help us think as much as reading does.

James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games can be a good way to learn. He thinks that they can help us make good decisions and think critically. Some games, like Sim City and Civilization, teach us how to make choices and solve problems. They also let us explore new ideas and concepts.

It's important to understand how technology affects our thinking and learning. As we spend more time using technology, we need to make sure we are using it in a way that helps us learn and think deeply.'

Matthew Crawford is a writer who also works as a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office, but he didn't like it. His first book was about the good things about doing manual work. His latest book is about how to live with modern technology.

Crawford noticed that advertisements pop up on our phones and computers all the time. He thinks this is making it hard for us to think and focus. We are constantly being interrupted and it's hard to have a conversation with someone without distractions. We are also losing the ability to do simple things, like talk to strangers.

Crawford thinks that technology is making us more selfish. We are more interested in our own thoughts and desires than in interacting with other people. He gives the example of a gym. In the past, people would listen to music together. Now, everyone listens to their own music on their headphones. This has made the gym less social.

Crawford suggests that we need to find ways to focus on the world around us. He gives the examples of a cook, an ice-hockey player, and a motorbike rider. These people have to deal with real things, not just representations of things. They have to use their judgment and work with others. This makes their experiences more real and satisfying.

Crawford also thinks that it's important to learn to focus on one thing at a time. This can help us focus on what's important and make it easier to talk to others.

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for a learner of level A2 on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR):

'What do you do for a living?' is a common question. But what if you're a philosopher like me? It's hard to explain what I do in just a few words. People often think that philosophers are special or smart, but we're just like everyone else. So, why do people think this?

One reason is that philosophers are known for thinking about big ideas and judging what others do. A long time ago, a famous philosopher named Aristotle said that thinking deeply about life is the most important thing. Many people still think that's true today.

Another reason is that some philosophers, like Socrates, said that we should think about our lives and make our own decisions. This means looking closely at what we do every day and making sure it's important to us. It's not just about reading books or being smart; it's about thinking about our daily lives.

However, many people think that philosophers are not connected to real life. They think we're too busy talking about big ideas to care about what's happening in the world. This is partly because philosophers often write for other experts, not for ordinary people. We need to change this and share our ideas with everyone.

I'm an ethicist, which means I think about what's right and wrong. But I think there's more to philosophy than just deciding what's right or wrong. I want to help people think about their daily lives and behaviors. By doing this, we can learn more about ourselves and the world around us.

Here is a simplified version of the text, adapted for learners of English at level A2 (CEFR):

Food and eating are important parts of our lives. Many people think that thinking deeply about food can make eating more enjoyable. However, philosophers have not often talked about food in a serious way. When they have, it's usually been as a way to talk about something else. For example, some philosophers have used eating as a metaphor to explain how we learn.

The ancient Greek philosopher Epicurus believed that we should try to be happy and avoid pain. He thought this applied to many parts of life, not just eating. Today, his name is often used to sell food and drinks. This is because people think that if something is good enough for philosophers, it must be good for them too.

Food is a social and cultural part of our lives. We don't just eat alone, we eat with others. This is why food is an important topic for philosophers. They can help us think about what we eat and why we eat it.

Some people are very good at writing about food. They can describe what it tastes like. But this is not a special skill, just a good way of using words. Philosophers have not paid much attention to how we taste food. This is strange, because we use our sense of taste all the time.

Food can also be beautiful. Some people think that food should be considered a work of art, like a painting or a piece of music. But food is eaten and then gone, so it can't be appreciated in the same way. There are also important questions about what we should eat. Should we choose food that is good for the environment, or food that is produced in a certain way? These are questions that philosophers can help us answer.

Finally, food can bring people together. Sharing a meal with others can help us understand different cultures and build friendships. This is an important part of diplomacy and international relations. Philosophers can help us think about the role of food in these situations.

Here is the simplified text for a learner of level A2:

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He wanted to make board games more exciting and challenging. He thought, "Why can't games have a story? Why can't what we do in one game affect the next game?" He took an old game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. This game is special because what we do in the game can change the game forever. We might have to tear up cards or draw on the board. The game is played over several sessions, and we can see how our choices affect the game. Daviau said, "You can point to the board and say, 'Look, I did that!'"

Daviau worked on another game called Pandemic. It's a cooperative game where we work together to save the world from diseases. He also made a game called SeaFall. In this game, we are sailors exploring the world in the 16th to 19th centuries. The designer of SeaFall, Rob Daviau, had to think about all the possible choices players could make to make sure the story didn't fall apart. He tested the game with players to see how it would work.

When Daviau started making legacy games, he didn't think it would be popular. He thought it would be a niche thing. But many people loved the idea. One player, Russell Chapman, said it's one of the biggest advances in game design in years. He likes that it's a new level of commitment and excitement. Another player, Ben Hogg, said the appeal of an unfolding adventure is more important than how long the game lasts. He compares it to watching a TV series.

The legacy format is like a video game or a TV show. We're buying into an experience. The game designer, Matt Leacock, compares it to writing a novel. He says you need to have an idea of how you want it to end and a good idea of where you want it to begin. Daviau is happy to see where others take the idea, but he thinks gamers will soon ask for something new.

Colby Dauch, the manager of the publisher of SeaFall, thinks the legacy format has changed the way we think about board games.<|eot_id|>

They think that we should be more open-minded and recognize that animals have their own special ways of thinking.

But then, some scientists started to think that animals were just machines that reacted to things, and they didn't have feelings or thoughts. This changed how people thought about animals and how they treated them. Now, some scientists are starting to think that animals are more like us than we thought. They have their own thoughts and feelings, and they can even learn and remember things in their own way.

The story of Inky the octopus is a good example of how animals are smarter than we think. Some people think that animals are just like us, but with different bodies. Dr. de Waal, a scientist who studies animals, thinks that this is a good way to think. He says that animals are not just like us, but they are also very different. We can learn a lot from them and appreciate their unique abilities.

'Robots are becoming more popular and will soon change many jobs. In the past, robots were only used in factories and car-making, but now they will be used in many other industries. Some people think that robots will take over most jobs that humans do, but others believe that humans will still have jobs. 

One company, Fastbrick Robotics, has created a robot that can lay 1,000 bricks in an hour, which would take two human bricklayers a whole day to do. Another robot, Tally, helps stock supermarkets and makes sure everything is in order.

Some people think that robots will create new jobs for technicians and programmers, but others worry that robots will make it harder for humans to work together. A expert on robotics, Dr. Jing Bing Zhang, says that robots will change the way we work and that people will need to learn new skills to keep up.

In the next few years, robots will become even smarter and more efficient. Many companies will have a special person in charge of robots, and governments will make new laws about robots. However, some jobs may disappear and people will need to find new ones.

Dr. Zhang says that people should not rely on the government to protect their jobs, but should instead learn new skills to adapt to the changing job market. He also thinks that robots will change the way we live at home and that we will see new types of robots that can interact with us in new ways.

This change also brings challenges, such as making sure we are safe and private. It is important that we learn more about robots and prepare for the future job market. Many countries need more people with skills in science, technology, engineering and maths (STEM) to stay competitive.'

Here is a rewritten version of the text at the A2 level:

Many people wonder why climbers want to climb mountains. One famous climber, George Mallory, said "Because it's there." This answer might inspire some people to try new things. Climbing can be a challenge and a way to have fun. 

Some people think climbing is just about adventure and excitement. Others believe it's about the feeling of freedom it gives them. But climbing can also be scary and restrictive. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not very liberating.

There are many different types of climbing, and each one has its own rules. Some climbers like to climb big mountains, while others prefer to climb smaller rocks. The way you climb depends on the type of climb you're doing.

Some people love climbing because it makes them feel free. Others enjoy the challenge of climbing and the sense of accomplishment when they reach the top. 

A US climber, Joe Fitschen, thinks we should ask "Why do people climb?" instead of "Why climb?" He believes that climbing is in our nature and that it's a way for us to test our limits.

Another idea is that climbing helps us develop important qualities like courage, humility, and respect for the environment. Climbing can also help us learn to appreciate the value of hard work and perseverance.

Some climbers believe that the most important thing is to be completely committed to your goal and to do it on your own, without help from others. This can make the achievement feel more special.

Finally, climbing can be a way to connect with nature and be present in the moment. It's a way to clear your mind and feel at peace. This is similar to the ideas of Zen philosophy, which teaches us how to be present and peaceful.

Overall, people climb for many different reasons. It's a way to challenge ourselves, have fun, and connect with nature.<|eot_id|>

'Alfred Brendel was a famous pianist who played classical music for many years. He was a serious person who liked to study and perform. He didn't teach many students, but he liked to write music and play it. One day, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of his concerts and asked for lessons. Alfred was surprised because Kit was very good at playing the piano. He listened to Kit play and thought, "This boy is very talented." Kit was 14 years old at the time. Alfred decided to teach Kit because he was impressed by his skills. Kit was a hard worker and always wanted to learn more. He also liked to compose his own music. Alfred was proud of Kit's progress and said, "He has a great memory and can play very well." He also said that Kit is very good at listening to his own playing and can make changes when needed. Alfred is now 80 years old and has stopped performing, but he is still busy with his music. He thinks that it's never too late to start something new, and he is enjoying his new career as a composer.'
